revisionDesc.change: Added via github because the file was stuck in finalization in the editor.
Submit - Enter edition and translation according to Mohamed G. Elmaghrabi, "Three Receipts for Beer Tax from Hibeh", Zeitschrift für Papyrologie und Epigraphik, Bd. 186 (2013), pp. 237-243

div.p: Year 3, Pachons 22, for the beer tax, fifteen drachmae and 3 obols. Year 3, Pachons 22. There has been paid into the tax office at Phebichis to Nikolaos the banker and Stotoetis the controller from Petosiris the amount due from Taembes from Talae for the beer tax on account of Pachons fifteen drachmae and three obols of bronze, total 15 drachmae and 3 obols. In the presence of Dorion, fifteen drachmae and 3 obols in total. In front of Petosiris son of Nechtyris ... Translation: M.G. Elmaghrabi, ZPE 186 (2013) 242
